rate_justification: Senior fullstack developer with AI-assisted development expertise, tight timeline premium, daily code review overhead
assumptions: Core MVP features only (user registration, basic marketplace functionality, payment integration)
Daily code reviews factored into timeline
1000 user capacity requirement met with scalable architecture

risk_notes.mitigation: Clarify core features in discovery call, document scope boundaries

risk_notes.risk: Daily code reviews may cause delays
risk_notes.mitigation: Establish review turnaround time expectations (24-hour response)
Request app name or screenshots to align expectations

clarifying_questions: Which similar app should we reference? (99% inspiration mention)
Do you have wireframes ready, or should I proceed with AI-generated wireframes?
What specific payment processing do you need? (Stripe, PayPal, etc.)
What are the core MVP features vs nice-to-haves?
